title: Habesha Market Campaign
description: A comprehensive digital marketing campaign for Habesha Market, increasing brand awareness and driving customer engagement through multi-channel strategies.
longDescription: A comprehensive digital marketing campaign that increased brand awareness and drove customer engagement for Habesha Market, a premium Ethiopian marketplace.
overview: Habesha Market is a premier marketplace for authentic Ethiopian products, from traditional clothing and accessories to artisanal home d√©cor and specialty foods. Our digital marketing campaign was designed to increase brand awareness, drive customer engagement, and boost sales across their online and physical retail channels.
challenges: Limited online visibility in a competitive marketplace
Inconsistent brand messaging across different platforms
Difficulty connecting with younger, tech-savvy Ethiopian diaspora
Low conversion rates from social media traffic to their e-commerce platform

approach.title: Brand Identity Refresh
approach.description: Refined brand messaging and visual elements to create a cohesive, premium-feeling identity

approach.title: Content Marketing
approach.description: Created authentic storytelling content highlighting Ethiopian culture, craftsmanship, and product origins

approach.title: Social Media Strategy
approach.description: Developed targeted campaigns across Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok with influencer partnerships

approach.title: Email Marketing

approach.title: SEO & SEM
approach.description: Optimized online presence for relevant keywords and targeted paid search campaigns

campaignElements.title: Audience Targeting
campaignElements.description: Precise customer segmentation focusing on the Ethiopian diaspora, cultural enthusiasts, and conscious consumers interested in authentic, ethically-sourced products.

campaignElements.title: Content Strategy
campaignElements.description: Authentic storytelling highlighting Ethiopian craftspeople, cultural significance of products, and behind-the-scenes glimpses of sourcing and production processes.

campaignElements.title: Performance Marketing
campaignElements.description: Data-driven campaign optimization with A/B testing, retargeting strategies, and conversion rate optimization for the e-commerce platform.
